statements: SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE id = 1;
SELECT report_name, revenue FROM Reports WHERE profit_margin > 0.2;
SELECT * FROM Reports ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT id, report_name, profit_margin FROM Reports WHERE customer_demographics->'age' = '30';
SELECT report_name, profit_margin FROM Reports WHERE revenue BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY profit_margin DESC
SELECT report_name, revenue FROM Reports WHERE profit_margin < 0.5 GROUP BY report_name HAVING revenue < 5000
SELECT id, profit_margin FROM Reports WHERE customer_demographics->>'age' = '30' ORDER BY id
SELECT report_name, profit_margin, revenue FROM Reports WHERE profit_margin < 0.2 AND revenue > 5000
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE customer_demographics @> '{"gender": "female"}'
SELECT * FROM revenue_report;
SELECT report_id, revenue FROM revenue_report ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT report_id, profit_margin FROM revenue_report ORDER BY profit_margin ASC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_report WHERE revenue > 5000 ORDER BY profit_margin DESC
SELECT report_id, revenue FROM revenue_report WHERE profit_margin < 0.5 ORDER BY report_id
SELECT profit_margin, revenue, report_id FROM revenue_report WHERE report_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_id, revenue FROM revenue_reports WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue ASC;
SELECT report_date, revenue FROM revenue_reports WHERE report_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM profit_margin_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_id, profit_margin FROM profit_margin_reports WHERE profit_margin > 0.1 ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports WHERE revenue > 50000 AND report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location = 'New York' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM revenue_report ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_date, revenue_amount FROM revenue_report WHERE revenue_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE customer_age > 30 AND customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_report ORDER BY report_date DESC, revenue_amount ASC
SELECT report_id, report_date, revenue_amount, revenue_source FROM profit_margin_report WHERE profit_source = 'Online'
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_age DESC
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 AND purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_gender FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports;
SELECT report_id, revenue, report_date FROM revenue_reports;
SELECT * FROM profit_margin ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM customer_reports GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 1000;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, revenue ASC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, revenue, sales_amount FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_reports ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_reports.customer_id;
SELECT report_id, profit, margin FROM profit_margin WHERE profit > 5000 AND margin < 0.2 ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, sales_amount FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_reports ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_reports.customer_id WHERE sales_amount > 10000;
